RepoBird Configuration Examples
================================

QUICK START:
  repobird examples schema        # Show configuration fields
  repobird examples generate      # Generate example file

SINGLE RUN FORMATS:
  • JSON (.json)         - Standard JSON configuration
  • YAML (.yaml, .yml)   - Human-friendly YAML format
  • Markdown (.md)       - Documentation with YAML frontmatter

COMMANDS:
  schema [type]     Show configuration schema
  generate [type]   Generate example configuration files

For detailed documentation, see: docs/run-config-formats.md
